title: Payments to physicians may increase opioid prescribing

title_detail.value: Payments to physicians may increase opioid prescribing

summary: US doctors who receive direct payments from opioid manufacturers tend to prescribe more opioids than doctors who receive no such payments, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: US doctors who receive direct payments from opioid manufacturers tend to prescribe more opioids than doctors who receive no such payments, according to new research.
